response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unser persönliches daten ignorieren? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #respekt"

translation: "why are there still companies that ignore our personal data? #dataprivacy #privatesphere #respect"

this post critically examines the issue of companies disregarding personal information and the importance of protecting individual privacy. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (private sphere), and #respekt (respect) are used to reach a wider audience and to categorize the post under these topics.
